unit: Unit 7 | Inference for Quantitative Data: Means
title: Standard Error of Sample Mean Guinea Pig Weight
question_text: Jackson weighed all of his pet guinea pigs and found the average weight to be $2.4\text{ pounds}$ . If the standard error of the sample mean was $0.2227$ and the sample standard deviation was $0.63\text{ pounds}$ , how many guinea pigs does Jason have?
